section.section: The term of a member appointed under subsection (a)(3) of this section is 3 years.
The terms of the members appointed under subsection (a)(3) of this section are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on October 1, 2008.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section:
A member of the Board:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Board; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.
The Governor shall designate the chair of the Board.
